attributes.action: Establish a national bank holiday to celebrate St George
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ireland have one, Scotland has one and the Welsh have one -  so why can't the English?

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Establish a national bank holiday to celebrate St George."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10838.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/StGeorge/
